<c=@flavor>The smell of leather and wood wafts off this quiver designed by Rox.</c>

This quiver has a simple back strap to wear if you don't have another back-slot item.
Double-click to unpack.
Punch a single target with your giant branded fist.
Double-click to imbue another back-slot item's stats into this appearance (one-time use).
Detonate the orb to burn foes and cure conditions on allies in the blast radius.
You cannot learn to dance while in combat.
Interact with non-player characters in the world by pressing [lbracket]%str1%[rbracket] when you get close to them.
